mapper.select: select * from sys_auth where auth_type = 0 and is_valid = 0 order by orders

select r.role_id,r.role_name,r.role_desc,r.role_code from sys_user u join sys_user_role ur on(u.user_id = ur.user_id) join sys_role r on (ur.role_id = r.role_id) where u.username = #{username} and r.is_valid = 0 order by r.orders

select a.auth_id,a.auth_name,a.auth_desc,a.auth_code, a.auth_layer,a.auth_url,a.is_valid from sys_user u join sys_user_role ur on(u.user_id = ur.user_id) join sys_role r on (ur.role_id = r.role_id) join sys_role_auth ra on (r.role_id = ra.role_id) join sys_auth a on (ra.auth_id = a.auth_id) where u.username = #{username} and a.is_valid = 0 order by a.orders
